00015   void AhcMapper::fillModuleConnection(const lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00016     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "ModuleConnection") throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcMapper::fillModuleConnection: expects collection of ModuleConnection objects");
00017 
00018     mappingModified();
00019 
00020     std::vector<CALICE::ModuleConnection*> moduleConnections;
00021 
00022     int maxModules = 0;
00023     int maxFe      = 0;
00024     int maxK       = 0;
00025 
00026     clearCrate();
00027     clearSlot();
00028 
00029     for (int i =0; i < col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00030       LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00031 
00032       if (obj) {
00033         moduleConnections.push_back(new CALICE::ModuleConnection(obj));
00034         if (moduleConnections.back()->getModuleID() > maxModules) maxModules = moduleConnections.back()->getModuleID();
00035         if (moduleConnections.back()->getFrontEnd() > maxFe) maxFe = moduleConnections.back()->getFrontEnd();
00036         if ((int)CALICE::CellIndex(moduleConnections.back()->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell()).getLayerIndex() > maxK ) maxK = CALICE::CellIndex(moduleConnections.back()->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell()).getLayerIndex();
00037         registerCrate(moduleConnections.back()->getCrate());
00038         registerSlot(moduleConnections.back()->getSlot());
00039         //      registerModuleType(moduleConnections.back()->getModuleType());
00040       }
00041       else throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcMapper::fillModuleConnection: expects collection of LCGenericObject resp. ModuleConnection");
00042     }
00043 
00044     initFe(maxFe);
00045     initModule(maxModules);
00046     initK(maxK);
00047 
00048     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < moduleConnections.size(); ++j) {
00049       int module        = moduleConnections[j]->getModuleID();
00050 
00051       int crate         = moduleConnections[j]->getCrate();
00052       int slot          = moduleConnections[j]->getSlot();
00053       int fe            = moduleConnections[j]->getFrontEnd();
00054 
00055       //      int connectorType = moduleConnections[j]->getConnectorType();
00056       int indexLowLeft  = moduleConnections[j]->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell();
00057       int moduleType    = moduleConnections[j]->getModuleType();
00058       //      std::string connectorTypeName(moduleConnections[j]->getConnectorTypeName());
00059 
00060       /* There is the feature that the type index stored in ModuleConnection is not
00061        * equal to the type stored in the module description. Therefore, a hardcode +4
00062        * is needed.
00063        */
00064       setModuleType(module, getCombinedModuleType(moduleType + 4));
00065 
00066       setModuleCrateSlotFe(module,crate,slot,fe);
00067       setModuleK(module,CALICE::CellIndex(indexLowLeft).getLayerIndex());
00068 
00069       /*
00070         std::cout << "Module " << module << std::endl;
00071         std::cout << " type: " << moduleType << std::endl;
00072         std::cout << " DAQ connection (crate/slot/fe): " << crate <<"/" << slot << "/" << fe << std::endl;
00073         std::cout << " connector type: " << connectorType << " (" << connectorTypeName << ")" << std::endl;
00074         std::cout << " index lower left cell: " << indexLowLeft << " " << CALICE::HcalCellIndex(indexLowLeft) << std::endl;
00075         std::cout << std::endl;
00076       */
00077     }
00078 
00079   }

00082   /* There is design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescription:
00083    * The translation between the internal cell index and electronic channel
00084    * is not contained in the class and has to be hardcoded.
00085    */
00086   void AhcMapper::getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(const unsigned int id, const unsigned int moduleType, int &chip, int &channel) const {
00087     chip = id / 18;
00088     if ((moduleType == 5) || (moduleType == 7)) chip += 6;
00089 
00090     channel = id % 18;
00091   }
00092 
00093   /* To get unique module offset identifier for the half-modules
00094    * some clever guy had to shift the cell index. Now, this gives
00095    * the problem, that the geometrical cellID in ModuleDescription
00096    * alone is wrong and needs an offset that is saved in ModuleLocation
00097    * or ModuleConnection.
00098    *
00099    * Unfortunately this cannot be transparently mapped to the data
00100    * structure in this class. This class assumes module types that
00101    * relate i,j to chip,chan. But the above mechanism allows to shift
00102    * i,j for each module indiviually.
00103    *
00104    * Nevertheless, up to now only module-type- and not module-dependant
00105    * shifts are used. Therefore, this gets corrected here.
00106    */
00107   int AhcMapper::correctCellIndex(const unsigned int moduleType, const int cellIndex) const {
00108     if (moduleType == 5) return cellIndex + 0x8000;
00109     if (moduleType == 6) return cellIndex + 0x40;
00110     if (moduleType == 7) return cellIndex + 0x8040;
00111     return cellIndex;
00112   }
00113 
00114   /* This Mapper expects one module to have only one type, therefore the
00115    * splitting into half-modules has to be reversed.
00116    */
00117   unsigned int AhcMapper::getCombinedModuleType(const unsigned int moduleType) const {
00118     return moduleType/2;
00119   }
00120 
00121   void AhcMapper::fillModuleDescription(const lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00122 
00123     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "ModuleDescription") throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcMapper::fillModuleDescription: expects collection of ModuleDescription objects");
00124 
00125     mappingModified();
00126 
00127     std::vector<CALICE::ModuleDescription*> moduleDescriptions;
00128 
00129     int maxChip             = 0;
00130     int maxChannel          = 0;
00131     unsigned int maxI       = 0;
00132     unsigned int maxJ       = 0;
00133 
00134     clearModuleType();
00135 
00136     for (int i =0; i < col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00137       LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00138 
00139       if (obj) {
00140         moduleDescriptions.push_back(new CALICE::ModuleDescription(obj));
00141 
00142         unsigned int moduleType = moduleDescriptions.back()->getModuleType();
00143 
00144         bool individualSize = moduleDescriptions.back()->hasCellDimensionsPerCell();
00145 
00146         //      std::cout << "moduleType: " << moduleType << " has " << moduleDescriptions.back()->getNCells() << " cells " << std::endl;
00147 
00148         unsigned int combinedModuleType = getCombinedModuleType(moduleType);
00149 
00150         registerModuleType(combinedModuleType);
00151 
00152         /* Run over all cells of module types. One design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescriptions
00153          * is that the classes do not know if cells are valid or not and the
00154          * electronic channel id defines the index of the indivual cells.
00155          * Obviously, a geometrical cell index of 0 seems not reasonable. Therefore,
00156          * we work around by ignoring cells with this index.
00157          */
00158         for ( unsigned int iCell=0; iCell < moduleDescriptions.back()->getNCells(); ++iCell )
00159           if (moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)) {
00160 
00161             int chip;
00162             int channel;
00163 
00164             getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(iCell, moduleType, chip, channel);
00165 
00166             if (chip    > maxChip)    maxChip    = chip;
00167             if (channel > maxChannel) maxChannel = channel;
00168 
00169 
00170             CALICE::CellIndex geoID(correctCellIndex(moduleType,moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)));
00171 
00172             unsigned int I = geoID.getPadColumn();
00173             unsigned int J = geoID.getPadRow();
00174 
00175             unsigned int sizeI;
00176             unsigned int sizeJ;
00177 
00178             if (individualSize) {
00179               sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getIndividualCellWidth(iCell)/10;
00180               sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getIndividualCellHeight(iCell)/10;
00181             }
00182             else {
00183               sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getCellWidth()/10;
00184               sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getCellHeight()/10;
00185             }
00186 
00187             if (I+sizeI > maxI) maxI = I+sizeI;
00188             if (J+sizeJ > maxJ) maxJ = J+sizeJ;
00189 
00190 
00191             //    std::cout << "cell " << std::setw(3) << iCell << " is [chip/channel||I/J] " << std::setw(2) << chip << "/" << std::setw(2) << channel << "||" << std::setw(2) << I << "/" << std::setw(2) << J  << " geoIndex:" << moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)  << std::endl;
00192 
00193           }
00194 
00195       }
00196       else throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcMapper::fillModuleDescription: expects collection of LCGenericObject resp. ModuleDescription");
00197 
00198     }
00199 
00200     initIJChipChannel(maxI,maxJ,maxChip,maxChannel);
00201 
00202     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < moduleDescriptions.size(); ++j) {
00203 
00204       unsigned int moduleType = moduleDescriptions[j]->getModuleType();
00205 
00206       bool individualSize = moduleDescriptions[j]->hasCellDimensionsPerCell();
00207 
00208       /* Run over all cells of module types. One design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescriptions
00209        * is that the classes do not know if cells are valid or not and the
00210        * electronic channel id defines the index of the indivual cells.
00211        * Obviously, a geometrical cell index of 0 seems not reasonable. Therefore,
00212        * we work around by ignoring cells with this index.
00213        */
00214       for ( unsigned int iCell=0; iCell < moduleDescriptions[j]->getNCells(); ++iCell )
00215         if (moduleDescriptions[j]->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)) {
00216 
00217           int chip;
00218           int channel;
00219           getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(iCell, moduleType, chip, channel);
00220 
00221           CALICE::CellIndex geoID(correctCellIndex(moduleType,moduleDescriptions[j]->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)));
00222           unsigned int I = geoID.getPadColumn();
00223           unsigned int J = geoID.getPadRow();
00224 
00225           unsigned int sizeI;
00226           unsigned int sizeJ;
00227 
00228           if (individualSize) {
00229             sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellWidth(iCell)/10;
00230             sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellHeight(iCell)/10;
00231           }
00232           else {
00233             sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getCellWidth()/10;
00234             sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getCellHeight()/10;
00235           }
00236 
00237           setModuleTypeIJChipChannel(getCombinedModuleType(moduleType), I, J, sizeI, sizeJ, chip, channel);
00238 
00239         }
00240     }
00241 
00242 
00243   }

00246   unsigned int AhcMapper::countAvailable(const std::vector<bool> &vec) const {
00247     unsigned int counter = 0;
00248     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00249       if (vec[i]) counter++;
00250     return counter;
00251 
00252   }

00254   void AhcMapper::printStats(std::ostream &ostream) const {
00255     ostream << "max/used modules       = " << std::setw(5) << _nMod     -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_moduleAvailable)      << std::endl
00256             << "max/used module Types  = " << std::setw(5) << _nModType -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_moduleTypeAvailable)  << std::endl
00257             << "    used crates        = " << std::setw(5) << ""            << " / " << std::setw(5) << _nCrate                               << std::endl
00258             << "max/used slots         = " << std::setw(5) << _maxSlot      << " / " << std::setw(5) << _nSlot                                << std::endl
00259             << "max      FE            = " << std::setw(5) << _nFe        -1  << std::endl
00260             << "    used crate/slot/FE = " << std::setw(5) << ""            << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_connectionAvailable) << std::endl
00261             << "max      chip          = " << std::setw(5) << _nChip    -1  << std::endl
00262             << "max      chan          = " << std::setw(5) << _nChan    -1  << std::endl
00263             << "max      I             = " << std::setw(5) << _nI         -1  << std::endl
00264             << "max      J             = " << std::setw(5) << _nJ         -1  << std::endl
00265             << "max/used K             = " << std::setw(5) << _nK       -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_kAvailable)           << std::endl
00266             << "******* values per module type ****" << std::endl;
00267     for (unsigned int moduleType=0; moduleType < _nModType;++moduleType)
00268       if (_moduleTypeAvailable[_moduleTypeName[moduleType]]) {
00269         ostream << "module type "  << _moduleTypeName[moduleType]                            << std::endl
00270                 << "  used I/J         = " << countAvailable(_ijAvailable[moduleType])       << std::endl
00271                 << "  used chip/chan   = " << countAvailable(_chipChanAvailable[moduleType]) << std::endl;
00272       }
00273     ostream << std::endl;
00274 
00275   }

00277   const std::string AhcMapper::printIfAvailable(bool available, unsigned int value) const {
00278     std::ostringstream stream;
00279     if (available) {
00280       stream << value;
00281       return stream.str();
00282     }
00283     else return std::string("not available");
00284   }
00285 
00286   void AhcMapper::print(std::ostream &ostream) const {
00287 
00288     for (unsigned int moduleType=0; moduleType < _nModType;++moduleType)
00289       if (_moduleTypeAvailable[_moduleTypeName[moduleType]]) {
00290         ostream << "module type "  << _moduleTypeName[moduleType] << std::endl
00291                 << "   chip channel    I    J  sizeI sizeJ" << std::endl;
00292         for (unsigned int chip=0; chip < _nChip; ++chip)
00293           for (unsigned int channel=0; channel < _nChan; ++channel)
00294             if (_chipChanAvailable[moduleType].at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))) {
00295               ostream << std::setw(7) << chip << " " << std::setw(7) << channel
00296                       << " " << std::setw(4) << getIFromIJIndex(_ijVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel)))
00297                       << " " << std::setw(4) << getJFromIJIndex(_ijVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel)))
00298                       << " " << std::setw(4) << _sizeIVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))
00299                       << " " << std::setw(4) << _sizeJVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))
00300                       << std::endl;
00301             }
00302       }
00303 
00304     for ( unsigned int module = 0; module < _nMod; module++ )
00305       if (_moduleAvailable.at(module)){
00306         ostream << "Module  " << module << std::endl
00307                 << "   type " << printIfAvailable(_moduleAvailable.at(module),_moduleTypeName[_typeVmodule.at(module)]) << std::endl
00308                 << "  crate " << getCrate(module) << std::endl
00309                 << "   slot " << getSlot(module) << std::endl
00310                 << "     fe " << getFe(module) << std::endl
00311                 << "      K " << getK(module) << std::endl
00312                 << std::endl;
00313       }
00314   }
